definitions: the action of mentioning a number of things one by one

examples.text: the complete enumeration of all possible genetic states
it is not necessary to give an exhaustive enumeration of the circumstances

shortDefinitions: action of mentioning number of things one by one

definitions: the action of establishing the number of something

examples.text: detailed enumeration of the income of the household
a complete enumeration of residents in the area

shortDefinitions: action of establishing number of something
